thread.title: View Host Whoopi Goldberg Comes To Tiffany Trump’s Defense
thread.title_full: View Host Whoopi Goldberg Comes To Tiffany Trump’s Defense

author: Charles Campbell
title: View Host Whoopi Goldberg Comes To Tiffany Trump’s Defense
text:
Tillerson Offers Russia ‘Cooperation’ Deal Under One Condition 
Watch our video below… 
“ Elle Magazine senior fashion editor tweeted that she and other editors changed their seats so they weren’t near the first daughter, Tiffany Trump,” co-host Whoopi Goldberg said. “There were also photos posted of Tiffany with empty seats next to her.” Nobody wants to sit next to Tiffany Trump at Philipp Plein, so they moved and the seats by her are empty. pic.twitter.com/XcxNYI6Kf8 
— Christina Binkley (@BinkleyOnStyle) February 14, 2017 Advertisement - story continues below 
— Christina Binkley (@BinkleyOnStyle) February 14, 2017 
Goldberg proceeded to tear into the Elle Magazine’s representatives, saying their behavior was unworthy of a publication which claims to represent women. 
“She doesn’t want to talk about her dad,” Goldberg said. “She’s looking at the fashion and for Elle Magazine, a magazine that says it’s a woman’s magazine, to do this …” 
“You know what, Tiffany, I’m supposed to go to a couple more shows. I don’t know what’s going to happen, but I’m coming to sit with you,” Goldberg said. Advertisement - story continues below
